content: round ripple bunny lovey © catherine bligh round ripple bunny lovey a round ripple bunny lovey perfect for a baby or toddler big enough to cuddle up to and small enough to carry around please note you may sell items that you create with this pattern as long as you credit me as the designer you may not sell this pattern or reproduce for anything other than personal use materials approximately 280m of a dk yarn i used stylecraft baby dk wondersoft and used almost one whole ball a small quantity of another dk yarn/colour for the head ears and arms of the bunny i used stylecraft bambino 4mm hook 3 5mm hook tapestry needle for sewing in ends small quantity of polyfill stuffing stitches used us terminology chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease across two stitches double_crochet = double_crochet page 1 of 4 round ripple bunny lovey © catherine bligh round ripple blanket use a 4mm hook and your primary yarn i used stylecraft baby dk
